amendment.description: To require a report assessing the Depleted Uranium Sensing and Treatment for Removal program of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4758 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4758 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S8571-8572) To require a report assessing the Depleted Uranium Sensing and Treatment for Removal program of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4758 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4758 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Cochran.
